lead_paragraph: Tennis officials on Wednesday launched an independent review into their anti-corruption practices after allegations the sport's watchdog had been ineffective in stamping out corruption in the game.

headline.print_headline: Authorities to Review Anti-Corruption Unit After Match-Fixing Scandal
headline.main: Authorities to Review Anti-Corruption Unit After Match-Fixing Scandal

snippet: Tennis officials on Wednesday launched an independent review into their anti-corruption practices after allegations the sport's watchdog had been ineffective in stamping out corruption in the game....
